bot.error: There was an error executing that command.

wrongFormat.title: ❌ Wrong Format
wrongFormat.footer: Enter two numbers as minimum and maximum range

invalidInput.title: ❌ Invalid Input
invalidInput.description:
Both arguments must be numbers!

**Correct example:**
`{prefix}numberpicker 1 100`
invalidInput.footer: Make sure you enter numbers, not letters or other characters

invalidRange.title: ❌ Invalid Range
invalidRange.description:
Minimum number ({min}) must be smaller than maximum number ({max})!

**Correct example:**
`{prefix}numberpicker 1 100`
invalidRange.footer: Make sure the first number is smaller than the second

rangeTooBig.title: ❌ Range Too Large
rangeTooBig.description:
Maximum range is 1,000,000 numbers.

Please use a smaller range.
